Package org.codehaus.cargo.module.webapp.websphere

Class IbmWebBndXmi

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jdom2.Document
      • org.codehaus.cargo.module.AbstractDescriptor
        • org.codehaus.cargo.module.webapp.websphere.IbmWebBndXmi
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Descriptor, VendorDescriptor, VendorWebAppDescriptor, org.jdom2.NamespaceAware, org.jdom2.Parent
    public class IbmWebBndXmi
extends AbstractDescriptor
implements VendorWebAppDescriptor
    Encapsulates the DOM representation of a websphere web deployment descriptor ibm-web-bnd.xmi to provide convenience methods for easy access and manipulation.
    See Also:
